system.notes: Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Combat Shield of the Deathwatch. Has Protection 30 Force Field with overload 01-10. -30 to Fellowship Tests with Craftworld Eldar as long as the shield is present (even if not wielded). Eldar have +10 to WS Tests vs bearer and will try to take the shield. Shield is decorated with Eldar jewels that may or may not be Spirit Stones.
